Data.oldValue: Generate a Request for Quotation for Project / Phase / Task Line

PO.Data: Generate a Request for Quotation for Project / Phase / Task / Line
A Request for Quotation Topic allows you to maintain a subscriber list of potential Vendors to respond to RfQs
A Request for Quotation Topic allows you to maintain a subscriber list of potential Vendors to respond to RfQs
Suppliers are requested to provide responses for all quantities
If selected, the response to the Request for Quotation needs to have a price for all Quantities
Suppliers are requested to provide responses for all quantities
If selected, the response to the Request for Quotation needs to have a price for all Quantities
Only invited vendors can respond to an RfQ
The Request for Quotation is only visible to the invited vendors
Only invited vendors can respond to an RfQ
The Request for Quotation is only visible to the invited vendors
Are Responses to the Request for Quotation accepted
If selected, responses for the RfQ are accepted
Are Responses to the Request for Quotation accepted
If selected, responses for the RfQ are accepted
This is a Self-Service entry or this entry can be changed via Self-Service

Self-Service allows users to enter data or update their data. The flag indicates, that this record was entered or created via Self-Service or that the user can change it via the Self-Service functionality.
This is a Self-Service entry or this entry can be changed via Self-Service

Self-Service allows users to enter data or update their data. The flag indicates, that this record was entered or created via Self-Service or that the user can change it via the Self-Service functionality.

exists (select 1 from C_RfQLine rfql inner join C_ProjectPhase ph on (rfql.C_RfQLine_ID = ph.C_RfQLine_ID) where rfql.C_RfQ_ID = C_RfQ.C_RfQ_ID and ph.C_Project_ID = @C_Project_ID@ ) or exists (select 1 from C_RfQLine rfql inner join C_ProjectTask pt on (rfql.C_RfQLine_ID = pt.C_RfQLine_ID) inner join C_ProjectPhase ph on (pt.C_ProjectPhase_ID = ph.C_ProjectPhase_ID) where rfql.C_RfQ_ID = C_RfQ.C_RfQ_ID and ph.C_Project_ID = @C_Project_ID@ ) or exists (select 1 from C_RfQLine rfql inner join C_ProjectLine pl on (rfql.C_RfQLine_ID = pl.C_RfQLine_ID) where rfql.C_RfQ_ID = C_RfQ.C_RfQ_ID and pl.C_Project_ID = @C_Project_ID@ )

exists (select 1 from C_ProjectPhase ph inner join C_RfQLine rfql on (ph.C_RfQLine_ID = rfql.C_RfQLine_ID) where ph.C_Project_ID = C_Project.C_Project_ID and rfql.C_RfQ_ID = @C_RfQ_ID@ ) or exists (select 1 from C_ProjectTask pt inner join C_ProjectPhase ph on (pt.C_ProjectPhase_ID = ph.C_ProjectPhase_ID) inner join C_RfQLine rfql on (pt.C_RfQLine_ID = rfql.C_RfQLine_ID) where ph.C_Project_ID = C_Project.C_Project_ID and rfql.C_RfQ_ID = @C_RfQ_ID@ ) or exists (select 1 from C_ProjectLine pl inner join C_RfQLine rfql on (pl.C_RfQLine_ID = rfql.C_RfQLine_ID) where pl.C_Project_ID = C_Project.C_Project_ID and rfql.C_RfQ_ID = @C_RfQ_ID@ )
